name: cody-music
description: mac osx spotify and itunes music player controller, spotify audio features, itunes and spotify genre, and playlist control

scripts.build: babel --presets es2015 -d dist/ lib && tsc && node packaging
scripts.test: npm run build && mocha -r ts-node/register test/**/test.ts --reporter spec --timeout 20000 --exit
scripts.playlist-test: npm run build && mocha -r ts-node/register test/playlists/test.ts --reporter spec --timeout 20000 --exit
scripts.web-test: npm run build && mocha -r ts-node/register test/web/test.ts --reporter spec --timeout 20000 --exit
scripts.controls-test: npm run build && mocha -r ts-node/register test/controls/test.ts --reporter spec --timeout 20000 --exit
scripts.itunes-test: npm run build && mocha -r ts-node/register test/itunes/test.ts --reporter spec --timeout 20000 --exit
scripts.features-test: npm run build && mocha -r ts-node/register test/features/test.ts --reporter spec --timeout 20000 --exit
scripts.desktop-test: npm run build && mocha -r ts-node/register test/desktop/test.ts --reporter spec --timeout 20000 --exit
scripts.state-test: npm run build && mocha -r ts-node/register test/state/test.ts --reporter spec --timeout 20000 --exit
scripts.spotify-test: npm run build && mocha -r ts-node/register test/spotify/test.ts --reporter spec --timeout 20000 --exit
scripts.profile-test: npm run build && mocha -r ts-node/register test/profile/test.ts --reporter spec --timeout 20000 --exit
scripts.nonplaylist-test: npm run build && mocha -r ts-node/register test/nonplaylists/test.ts --reporter spec --timeout 20000 --exit
scripts.search-test: npm run build && mocha -r ts-node/register test/search/test.ts --reporter spec --timeout 20000 --exit
scripts.caching-test: npm run build && mocha -r ts-node/register test/caching/test.ts --reporter spec --timeout 20000 --exit

author: software
